titleStmt.title: Familiar letters: vol. I. Written by the Right Honourable, John, late Earl of Rochester, to the honourable Henry Savile, esq; and other letters by persons of honour and quality. With letters written by the most ingenious Mr. Tho. Otway, and Mrs. K. Philips. Publish'd from their original copies. With modern letters by Tho. Cheek, Esq; Mr. Dennis, and Mr. Brown.
titleStmt.author: Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.
Otway, Thomas, 1652-1685.
Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.
Cheek, Thomas.
Philips, Katherine, 1631-1664.
Dennis, John, 1657-1734.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Onley, for S. Briscoe, at the corner of Charles-street, in Russel-street, Covent-garden,

notesStmt.note: With an initial table of contents.
With advertisment pages on A1v, A8v, and p. [1] at end of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
